name: Goose Sports Resort
description: Wii Sports Resort, the game of our childhood. I love it and still play it to this day.  As a game dev I just wanted to capture some of that magic into a 2d experience. This game has different mini games than Wii Sports Resort. This is a 2d game, but still fun to play. This project was just for fun and I am happy with it. I hope you enjoy!
